ValidationRule.description: When the value 'Other' in the picklist for the different fields of an action, the system proposes to fill ' Free text box' field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND((OR(ISPICKVAL( CH_Source__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL(CH_Category__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL( CH_Sub_category__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL(CH_Scope__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL( CH_Additional_Comms__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL( CH_Cancellation_Cause__c , 'Other'),ISPICKVAL( CH_Rejection_Cause__c , 'Other'))), ISBLANK( CH_Free_text_box__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the value that misses in the pick-list where you put other thank you.
